tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE customer_foot_traffic_data (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    store_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMPTZ,
    entrance_detected BOOLEAN,
    exit_detected BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE customer_foot_traffic (
    customer_id INT,
    store_id INT,
    visit_date DATE,
    visit_duration INT,
    purchase_amount FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE foot_traffic_data (
    foot_traffic_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    store_id INT,
    customer_id INT,
    entrance_time TIMESTAMP,
    exit_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE customers (
  customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_name VARCHAR(255),
  store_id INT,
  entry_time TIMESTAMP,
  exit_time TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE stores (
  store_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  store_name VARCHAR(255),
  location VARCHAR(255),
  manager_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE foot_traffic (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  store_id INT,
  entry_time TIMESTAMP,
  exit_time TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE managers (
  manager_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  manager_name VARCHAR(255),
  store_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE StoreLocations (
    store_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    store_name VARCHAR(255),
    location_lat FLOAT,
    location_long FLOAT
)
